title: Who will be traded first KD or Mitchell?
description:
Will there be a surprise team that could trade for KD? Jalen and Jacoby are thinking a certain hometown team that may make a push. Also, GM Jacoby makes a real offer to GM Jalen for KD, this time it’s the Miami Heat. Find out if the Heat has what it takes to seal the deal. Also, the Lakers need either need to come together or split apart. Find out if the guys think they are stuck with each other and whether or not they can make that work. And Juan Soto wins the Home Run Derby after turning down $440 million dollars. Listen to hear why Jalen thinks that’s a good idea. All that and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
